attributes.title: Last of Us 2 Spoilercast
attributes.description: SPOILER WARNING for The Last of Us Part II: In this no-holds barred discussion on everything that happens in the game we dive deep on Ellie, Joel, Abby, Lev, and so much more.
attributes.display_title: Last of Us 2 Spoilercast

attributes.title: Game of the Year So Far
attributes.description: It's our annual mid-year discussion of our favorites games of the year...so far! We're joined by Gamespot's Kallie Plagge to chat Final Fantasy VII Remake, Animal Crossing: New Horizon, and more!
attributes.display_title: Game of the Year So Far

attributes.title: PS5 Backwards Compatibility New Info - Ep. 187
attributes.description: On WGG Live for 8/31/2020 Andrea and Britt chat about Ubisoft's new controversy, the PS5 backwards compatibility new details, Apple's latest slap on Epic Games, and is that Mass Effect trilogy actually real?
attributes.display_title: PS5 Backwards Compatibility New Info - Ep. 187

attributes.title: Mario Celebrates 35 in Surprise Nintendo Direct! - Ep. 188
attributes.description: The crew chats about ALL THAT MARIO NEWS, Tokyo Game Show's upcoming schedule, the potential sale of Warner Brothers Interactive, the new name of Ubisoft's Gods and Monsters and more! Hands-on includes Marvel's Avengers, Tell Me Why and Struggling. Plus a special interview with APEX Legends voice actress Anjali Bhimani hosted by Ri!
attributes.display_title: Mario Celebrates 35 in Surprise Nintendo Direct! - Ep. 188

attributes.title: Xbox Series X/S Launch Date Confirmed - Ep. 189
attributes.description: This week Britt and Steimer talk about ALL of that Xbox news, including the release date, price and preorders, as well as Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity, more 4K Switch rumors and more. Hands-on includes Immortals Fenyx Rising and Marvel’s Avengers!
attributes.display_title: Xbox Series X/S Launch Date Confirmed - Ep. 189

attributes.title: Jennifer Hale Life Lessons - Ep. 190
attributes.description: Legendary voice actor Jennifer Hale joins Andrea and Britt for a special WGG Live! Jennifer takes your questions, chats about her upcoming audiobook To Sleep in a Sea of Stars, and lays down some great life lessons.
attributes.display_title: Jennifer Hale Life Lessons - Ep. 190

attributes.title: PS5 Pre-Orders Are LIVE - Ep. 191
attributes.description: On this episode Britt, Andrea and Ri talk about the PS5’s borked pre-order process and the games that were announced during the PS5 Showcase. Also, is that Mass Effect Trilogy remaster really happening?! In hands-on Andrea and Ri talk about their time DJing in Fuser, Andrea played Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War multiplayer and Ri needs to work on her poker face in Among Us.
attributes.display_title: PS5 Pre-Orders Are LIVE - Ep. 191

attributes.title: XBOX bought BETHESDA!? - Ep. 192
attributes.description: Andrea and Britt are stunned at the huge news that Microsoft purchased Zenimax Media for $7.5 billion!
attributes.display_title: XBOX bought BETHESDA!? - Ep. 192

attributes.title: Xbox Set Pre-Order Record! - Ep. 193
attributes.description: Xbox set record pre-order numbers, more details about Bethesda's acquisition by Microsoft, Sony's Spider-Man PS5 problem, and BlizzCon dates are finally announced. In hands-on Britt chats about 13 Sentinels Aegis Rim, Steimer started Hades on Switch, and Andrea was feeling the comfort food of Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning. In September's Patreon Produced segment they chat about which fictional characters would have a hard time in the real world.
attributes.display_title: Xbox Set Pre-Order Record! - Ep. 193

attributes.title: Xbox Series X First Impressions w/ Danny Peña - Ep. 194
attributes.description: Xbox Series X is in the wild so we recap some first impressions with Gamertag Radio's Danny Peña! Danny and Andrea go toe-to-toe in a debate on if Bethesda's upcoming titles will make it to PS5...and yes, a wager is made.
attributes.display_title: Xbox Series X First Impressions w/ Danny Peña - Ep. 194

attributes.title: Spider-Man Gets a New Face! - Ep. 195
attributes.description: Peter Parker got a new face in Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered, crunch conditions for the team working on Cyberpunk 2077, and new Animal Crossing and Pokemon DLC. In hands-on Britt rage quit Mafia Definitive Edition and Andrea is digging the space combat of Star Wars Squadrons. Plus we've got a special interview presented by LogitechG with Tiffany Beers, the Head of Gaming Innovation and Audio Engineering to discuss their new color collection, inclusivity in gaming, and how you can transition into games from other industries.
attributes.display_title: Spider-Man Gets a New Face! - Ep. 195

attributes.title: PS5 Preview From Japan - Ep. 196
attributes.description: WGG Live for Oct. 5, 2020 includes a look at the first PS5 Previews coming from Japan, new details on Ghost of Tsushima's co-op mode, and Netflix has officially ordered Season 3 of The Witcher!
attributes.display_title: PS5 Preview From Japan - Ep. 196

attributes.title: PS5 Breakdown & Watch Dogs: Legion Preview - Ep. 197
attributes.description: This week we're looking at the PS5 breakdown video, changes to PS trophies, Resident Evil cast photos, and Nintendo Super World food photos! In hands-on Riana and Andrea deep dive into their hands-on with Watch Dogs Legion while Britt gives a short teaser of her time with Baldur's Gate 3. For the feature segment Riana interview Stephanie Ijoma of Nnesaga about being a black woman and content creator and the importance of Black History Month in the U.K.
attributes.display_title: PS5 Breakdown & Watch Dogs: Legion Preview - Ep. 197

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed: Valhalla Final Gameplay Preview - Ep. 198
attributes.description: This week Playstation is back in the news but this time for a PS4 update, Spider-Cat is joining Miles Morales, and SEGA is turning 60! Andrea played a few more hours of AC: Valhalla and had a lot to say about it, plus Britt gives her thoughts on Baldur's Gate 3 in early access. For the feature segment, Andrea interviews CEO and owner of Nerdvana Games - Kristy Pitchford - about running a restaurant during the pandemic while also preparing to publish Bunkers & Badasses, an upcoming tabletop RPG.
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed: Valhalla Final Gameplay Preview - Ep. 198

attributes.title: Inside Iron Galaxy with Co-CEO Chelsea Blasko - Ep. 199
attributes.description: Iron Galaxy's Co-CEO Chelsea Blasko joins Andrea and Britt to run down the weekend headlines and chat about running a game development studio during COVID. She chats about her history with the company, why company culture is so important, and some of the challenges of making games for multiple platforms.
attributes.display_title: Inside Iron Galaxy with Co-CEO Chelsea Blasko - Ep. 199

attributes.title: AOC Breaks Twitch Record - Ep. 200
attributes.description: This week we celebrate EPISODE 200 of What’s Good Games! We kick things off by chatting about AOC’s record-breaking Twitch stream, NBA 2K21’s icky unskippable in-game ads, Ubisoft Connect and more! We then take time to reflect on these past 200 episodes by reading listener messages and chatting about how far we’ve come. Hands-on is all about ghoOoOOosts: Ghost of Tsushima Legends and the paranormal investigation game Phasmophobia! We continue the spirit of spooky season in the Patreon produced third segment and chat about paranormal experiences we’ve had ourselves.
attributes.display_title: AOC Breaks Twitch Record - Ep. 200

attributes.title: The PS5 is HERE! - Ep. 201
attributes.description: The PS5 has arrived!!! Okay but we've also got news to talk about including those Xbox Series X fridges, new APEX Legends content, and special guest Steven Spohn from AbleGamers joins us!
attributes.display_title: The PS5 is HERE! - Ep. 201

attributes.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Delayed AGAIN - Ep. 202
attributes.description: In a string of bummer news for Cyberpunk 2077 the game is delayed AGAIN, knocking it out of Game Awards contention. The crew also discusses the arrival of PS5 and Xbox Series X along with a recap on the Nintendo Direct Mini: Britt is VERY excited about the new Story of Seasons. In hands-on, everyone chats in detail about their hands-on impressions with Watch Dogs: Legion.
attributes.display_title: Cyberpunk 2077 Delayed AGAIN - Ep. 202

attributes.title: PS5 vs. Xbox Series X - Ep. 203
attributes.description: The next-gen console showdown is HERE! We compare PS5 head-to-head with Xbox Series X and in our initial hands-on, plus Steimer and Andrea have played Spider-Man: Miles Morales and Britt gushes over Yakuza: Like a Dragon just like we all knew she would!
attributes.display_title: PS5 vs. Xbox Series X - Ep. 203

attributes.title: Mass Effect Remaster is REAL! - Ep. 204
attributes.description: On WGG Live for 11/9/2020 Kayla Jouet, PR Coordinator at Uppercut, joins Andrea and Britt to chat about the incoming reviews for Bugsnax and Assasin's Creed Valhalla, the Mass Effect Remaster news and confirmation of a NEW Mass Effect game, and more.
attributes.display_title: Mass Effect Remaster is REAL! - Ep. 204

attributes.title: Alanah Pearce is here for Next-Gen Launch Week! - Ep. 205
attributes.description: Alanah Pearce joins Andrea and Steimer while Britt's away working on a secret project. They chat about the new generation launch, Twitch's response to DMCA takedowns, and an update on the Apple vs. Epic Games lawsuit. Alanah chats about her time with FUSER and Watch Dogs Legion, Steimer is catching Bugsnax and playing minigames in Yakuza Like a Dragon, and Andrea is just getting started in Assassin's Creed Valhalla.
attributes.display_title: Alanah Pearce is here for Next-Gen Launch Week! - Ep. 205

attributes.title: Xbox Series X Sets Record - Ep. 206
attributes.description: On WGG Live for 11/16/2020 Andrea and Britt are joined by Mario Rivera from DualShockers to chat Xbox Series X/S having the biggest Xbox launch ever, AbleGamers gets gifted $1M from Twitch, and a Capcom hacker attack leaks Resident Evil Village release window.
attributes.display_title: Xbox Series X Sets Record - Ep. 206

attributes.title: Game Awards 2020 Nominations - Ep. 207
attributes.description: The Game Awards 2020 nominees have been revealed and the crew is giving their thoughts, plus they chat Embracer Group's giant acquistion, Apple finally drops their platform fees, and Xbox speaks yet again about Bethesda's exclusivity. In hands-on Steimer and Britt are both playing Yakuza Like a Dragon while Andrea is knee-deep in her viking fantasy in Assassin's Creed: Valhalla.
attributes.display_title: Game Awards 2020 Nominations - Ep. 207

attributes.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Copies Leaked - Ep. 208
attributes.description: On WGG Live for 11/23/2020 Andrea and Britt are joined by Jeff Cannata to chat about Cyberpunk discs out in the wild, HBO's The Last of Us TV adaptation, new info from the Capcom leak, and more!
attributes.display_title: Cyberpunk 2077 Copies Leaked - Ep. 208

attributes.title: Xbox Coming to Smart TVs Within a Year? - Ep. 209
attributes.description: This week the crew is chatting about if Xbox will come to smart TVs, Cyberpunk 2077 is probably going to a long game, and the Tomb Raider franchise is back. In hands-on Steimer finished catching all the Bugsnax, Britt has been hack and slashing her way through Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity, and Andrea is up Schitt's Creek. Lastly they reminisce about Black Friday scores and favorite Thanksgiving memories.
attributes.display_title: Xbox Coming to Smart TVs Within a Year? - Ep. 209

attributes.title: Super Nintendo World Opening Date - Ep. 210
attributes.description: On the final WGG Live of 2020, Andrea and Britt chat about the review scores for Immortals Fenyx Rising, the upcoming opening of Super Nintendo World theme park, and they discuss the importance of review scores when making purchases decisions.
attributes.display_title: Super Nintendo World Opening Date - Ep. 210

attributes.title: Fortnite Galactus Event Breaks Record - Ep. 211
attributes.description: This week we're chatting about the new Nintendo Switch update, Fortnite's recording breaking Galactus event which also brought rumors of Kratos, and a study about players who use inverted controls. In hands-on Britt chats about her time exploring Immortals Fenyx Rising, Andrea is still in the thick of Assassin's Creed Valhalla, and Steimer finished Spider-Man: Miles Morales but also started watching Schitt's Creek. We also chat about the His Dark Materials series on HBO and is Andrea burned out on Cyberpunk 2077 marketing ads?
attributes.display_title: Fortnite Galactus Event Breaks Record - Ep. 211

attributes.title: New Mass Effect Revealed at The Game Awards - Ep. 212
attributes.description: Andrea, Britt, and Riana give their post Game Awards 2020 thoughts on all the reveals including the New Mass Effect teaser trailer, Dragon Age new details, The Callisto Protocol, Vin Diesel in Ark 2, the return of Perfect Dark and so much more.
attributes.display_title: New Mass Effect Revealed at The Game Awards - Ep. 212

attributes.title: Cyberpunk 2077: What's Going On? - Ep. 213
attributes.description: This week Riana Manuel joins us to chat about what the heck is going on with Cyberpunk 2077 and CD Projekt Red. We also recap the Nintendo indies showcase and discuss Ri's time with Tetris Effect: Connected and Immortals Fenyx Rising. Lastly we ponder what video game stories we want to see that haven't been done and all I'll say is: SPICE GIRLS.
attributes.display_title: Cyberpunk 2077: What's Going On? - Ep. 213

attributes.title: What's Good Games Awards 2020 - Ep. 214
attributes.description: It’s time for the WGG Awards! Join Britt, Andrea and Steimer as they talk about some of their favorite moments, characters, choices and more from video games in 2020. Let us know what your picks would’ve been! NOTE: spoilers for The Last of Us Part II, Ghost of Tsushima and Final Fantasy VII Remake are within.
attributes.display_title: What's Good Games Awards 2020 - Ep. 214
